scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend ci && npm --prefix frontend run build && cp -r frontend/dist ./dist
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000"
scripts.install-deps: cd frontend && npm ci && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
